data.oai_dc:dc: Data from model runs in Figure 2 and 3. Each of the five variables, umatFigxxxx, corresponds to a panel in Figure 2 or 3. Use imagesc(umatFigxxxx(:,:,2)) to see the vegetation component (as in the panels) and deduce the correspondence, and imagesc(umatFigxxxx(:,:,1)) for the water component of the Klausmeier model.
